channel.title: [pi] need help with teleports AND BACKGROUND [PI]
channel.description: 1.How can i add new teleports to mage book? like monster tele and a list with teles? 2.how can i change my background? im using Complexion X

item.title: [pi] need help with teleports AND BACKGROUND [PI]
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“smil3, post:1, topic:384826”]1.How can i add new teleports to mage book? like monster tele and a list with teles?
2.how can i change my background? im using Complexion X[/quote]

  1. Action handler if it teles u then find the coord that it teles u to search one of the coords like x or y and find an exact match then change it to open a list and make the list do something er… i dont exactly know how to do that but I’m sure theres tutorials.

  2. If it’s webclient ready you will have to go into the cache and edit the background then re upload it to a site that allows direct linking then go in your client on cachedownloader.java look for the current cache link change it to the new cache link (direct link) a direct link is something u just type in and it opens the download box not a site that lets u click on something to download

If its not webclient ready just open the folder look in the main folder look for the image if its not there move on to your sprites by pressing cntrl f and typing “sprites” or “sprits” I have no idea why but some servers folder name is “sprits” lol

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] need help with teleports AND BACKGROUND [PI]
